Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Provides free use of state parks for members or citizens of state or federally recognized Native American nations
Summary: Provides free use of public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in this state for members or citizens of state or federally recognized Native American nations.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing free use of state parks for members or citizens of state or federally recognized Native American nations
